fields.description:
Latest version of AAL is now available, changes since last time:
 * Moves all logging to debug
 * Adds in timeout and retries to requests to mitigate (very rare) hanging seen when reading from AsyncClient, related github issue: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-java-v2/issues/5755

comments.body:
ahmarsuhail opened a new pull request, #7469:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7469

   ### Description of PR
   
    Latest version of AAL is now available, changes since 0.0.4:
   
   * Moves all logging to debug
   * Adds in timeout and retries to requests to mitigate (very rare) hanging seen when reading from AsyncClient, related github issue: https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-java-v2/issues/5755
   
   ### How was this patch tested?
   
   Ran ITestS3AAnalyticsAcceleratorStreamReading, will run the test suite once it's available in Maven!

fuatbasik commented on code in PR #7469:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7469#discussion_r1981377089


##########
hadoop-tools/hadoop-aws/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/s3a/ITestS3AAnalyticsAcceleratorStreamReading.java:
##########
@@ -64,8 +64,6 @@
 public class ITestS3AAnalyticsAcceleratorStreamReading extends AbstractS3ATestBase {
 
   private static final String PHYSICAL_IO_PREFIX = "physicalio";

Review Comment:
   we can get rid of this   private static final String PHYSICAL_IO_PREFIX = "physicalio"; too right?

ahmarsuhail commented on code in PR #7469:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7469#discussion_r1981384138


##########
hadoop-tools/hadoop-aws/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/s3a/ITestS3AAnalyticsAcceleratorStreamReading.java:
##########
@@ -64,8 +64,6 @@
 public class ITestS3AAnalyticsAcceleratorStreamReading extends AbstractS3ATestBase {
 
   private static final String PHYSICAL_IO_PREFIX = "physicalio";

Review Comment:
   no it's used in the last test

ahmarsuhail commented on PR #7469:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7469#issuecomment-2704776777

   Artefacts in maven: https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/software/amazon/s3/analyticsaccelerator/analyticsaccelerator-s3/1.0.0/, all tests pass. Merging
hey, don't forget to put S3A as a prefix on the commit..
sorry! didn't realise we had to do that, will do from now on

ahmarsuhail opened a new pull request, #7603:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7603

   ### Description of PR
   
   Backport of https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7469. 
   
   ### How was this patch tested?
   
   Testing in progress
   
   ### For code changes:
   
   - [ ] Does the title or this PR starts with the corresponding JIRA issue id (e.g. 'HADOOP-17799. Your PR title ...')?
   - [ ] Object storage: have the integration tests been executed and the endpoint declared according to the connector-specific documentation?
   - [ ] If adding new dependencies to the code, are these dependencies licensed in a way that is compatible for inclusion under [ASF 2.0](http://www.apache.org/legal/resolved.html#category-a)?
   - [ ] If applicable, have you updated the `LICENSE`, `LICENSE-binary`, `NOTICE-binary` files?

ahmarsuhail commented on PR #7603:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7603#issuecomment-2839228377

   Tested in us-east-1, all good. Except `ITestS3AContractOpen.testInputStreamReadNegativePosition`, ticket for that is here: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HADOOP-19556, won't block merge on that failure.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved
